TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PrintJobInfo : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintJobInfo extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type PrintJobInfo = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: This class represents the description of a print job.

remarks.para: This class represents the description of a print job. The print job state includes properties such as its id, print attributes used for generating the content, and so on. Note that the print jobs state may change over time and this class represents a snapshot of this state.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
